subject: v1.20.1 on TEST — param fix deployed, requesting PROD approval
body:
Sarah,

v1.20.1 is now on TEST. Fixed the POST check-proximity param mismatch — handler now accepts both lat/lng and latitude/longitude in the request body.

All 4 original blockers are resolved:
1. GET /api/events/count — VERIFIED by you
2. POST /api/venues/check-proximity — param fix deployed, ready for re-verify
3. Organizer projection — confirmed Express parity (your call: separate enhancement)
4. isApproved filter — confirmed Express parity (your call: separate enhancement)

El Gotan is doing the testing on TEST now.

Requesting PROD promotion approval from you and Quinn. All changes are Express-parity fixes — no new behavior, no breaking changes, no architectural shifts. Two small additions (events/count endpoint + POST method on check-proximity) and one response shape correction.

Please confirm go/no-go when you're satisfied with TEST verification.

— Fulton
